title: A Hierarchy of Dystopias
summary: Using Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs, we can actually see what's at the heart of a dystopia and build numerous possible worlds.
long_summary: Dystopias are common in fiction and commonly involve corrupt governments, societal unrest, looming danger, and so forth. Using Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs, we can actually see what's at the heart of a dystopia and build numerous possible worlds.
